item.title: Different Types of Bicycle
item.description: Folding Bike Characteristics : compact, light and flexible User type : murban society with high mobility Place of use : urban street Mountain Bike Characteristics : tough structure, with suspension fork User type : outdoor activity lover Place of use : forest, mountains Roadbike Characteristics : tough and light structure, curved handlebar, acceleration features User type : bicycle sports lovers, long-distance use
